articles.title: Musk's xAI sues Apple and OpenAI for alleged AI conspiracy lawsuit
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI sued Apple and OpenAI in federal court, alleging the companies conspired to prevent competition in the market for artificial intelligence tools.
articles.translated_title: Musk's xAI sues Apple and OpenAI for alleged AI conspiracy lawsuit
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's xAI sued Apple and OpenAI in federal court, alleging the companies conspired to prevent competition in the market for artificial intelligence tools.

articles.title: Melania Trump announces K-12 school AI challenge
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump announced a new Presidential Artificial Intelligence Challenge Tuesday, inviting K-12 students and educators to participate.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump announces K-12 school AI challenge
articles.translated_summary: First lady Melania Trump announced a new Presidential Artificial Intelligence Challenge Tuesday, inviting K-12 students and educators to participate.

articles.title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge contest
articles.summary: Melania Trump is inviting students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest using artificial intelligence. The goal is to help them get comfortable with AI and to use it to solve issues in their communities.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge contest
articles.translated_summary: Melania Trump is inviting students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest using artificial intelligence. The goal is to help them get comfortable with AI and to use it to solve issues in their communities.

articles.title: Meta to launch California super PAC backing pro-AI candidates, Politico reports
articles.summary: Meta is setting up a new California-focused political action committee (PAC) to back state-level candidates favoring lighter regulation of technology, particularly artificial intelligence, Politico reported on Tuesday.
articles.translated_title: Meta to launch California super PAC backing pro-AI candidates, Politico reports
articles.translated_summary: Meta is setting up a new California-focused political action committee (PAC) to back state-level candidates favoring lighter regulation of technology, particularly artificial intelligence, Politico reported on Tuesday.

articles.title: AI makes it harder for entry-level coders to find jobs, study says
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is making it harder for entry-level workers in the U.S. to find jobs in software development and customer service, according to new research.
articles.translated_title: AI makes it harder for entry-level coders to find jobs, study says
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence is making it harder for entry-level workers in the U.S. to find jobs in software development and customer service, according to new research.

articles.title: Melania Challenges Kids to Create (Trumpy) AI Projects
articles.summary: Melania challenges kids to create (Trumpy) AI projects. K-12 students who enter the nationwide artificial intelligence competition will be judged on their project’s relevance to the Trump administration’s “priorities, values, or vision”.
articles.translated_title: Melania Challenges Kids to Create (Trumpy) AI Projects
articles.translated_summary: Melania challenges kids to create (Trumpy) AI projects. K-12 students who enter the nationwide artificial intelligence competition will be judged on their project’s relevance to the Trump administration’s “priorities, values, or vision”.

articles.title: Melania Trump Takes On New Trump Administration Role
articles.summary: The First lady is leading an initiative by the Trump administration to build interest and expertise in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump Takes On New Trump Administration Role
articles.translated_summary: The First lady is leading an initiative by the Trump administration to build interest and expertise in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge
articles.summary: Students who sign up will complete a project using an artificial intelligence method or tool to address a community challenge.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge
